notes: Successive attacks with Dragon Scale do not stack, but refresh the duration instead.
The attacks first apply the debuff, then their own damage.
Deals damage in 1 second intervals, starting 1 second after the debuff is applied, resulting in 3 instances.
Can deal up to 54 damage (before reductions).
Does not work against wards. Works against buildings.
abilities.description: Causes attacks to burn the enemy, dealing 18 damage per second for 3 seconds. Affects buildings.
